abstract: I.B.M. has agreed to put Nvidia’s Tesla graphics chips in one of its mainstream server computers – a big win for Nvidia and a blow to Intel.
snippet: I.B.M. has agreed to put Nvidia’s Tesla graphics chips in one of its mainstream server computers – a big win for Nvidia and a blow to Intel.
lead_paragraph: Nvidia opened the technology industry’s standard procedure playbook, turned to the section on roiling Intel and followed the instructions by signing up I.B.M. as a partner.

headline.main: Nvidia Finds a Friend in I.B.M.
